articles.content: After The Rise of Skywalker, no one expected Mark Hamill to reprise his role as Luke Skywalker again. Regardless, The Mandalorian season 2 finale brought Hamill back to Star Wars in a big way. Thanks… [+1305 chars]

articles.description: The celebrity doctor, who previously declared that widespread death from COVID-19 is “not gonna happen,” revealed on Instagram that he tested positive and said “COVID’s not fun.”
articles.content:
